abstract: Gen C Robert Kehler, head of Defense Department's Strategic Command, acknowledges that Pentagon needs to step up efforts to clarify military's doctrine for waging offensive computer warfare and set up rules of engagement to guide specific cyberattacks.
snippet: Officials are working to clarify a military doctrine on waging cyberattacks after a plan for such an attack on Libya was rejected.
